snippet: Jonathon Gatehouse, author of "The Instigator: How Gary Bettman Remade the League and Changed the Game Forever," talks about the N.H.L.'s commissioner and his lockout.
abstract: Jonathon Gatehouse, author of "The Instigator: How Gary Bettman Remade the League and Changed the Game Forever," talks about the N.H.L.'s commissioner and his lockout.

headline.main: Q. and A. With Biographer of Gary Bettman
